org.fhaes.fhrecorder.controller

Class FileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhaes.fhrecorder.controller.FileController

  • public class FileController
extends java.lang.Object
    FileController Class. This file contains the FHX2 file management functions of the service layer.
    Author:
    Alex Beatty, Clayton Bodendein, Kyle Hartmann, Scott Goble

      • isEnforcingOldReqs

        public static java.lang.Boolean isEnforcingOldReqs()
        Returns a value indicating whether or not the old FHX2 file requirements are to be enforced.
        Returns:
        true if yes, false if no

      • isChangedSinceOpened

        public static java.lang.Boolean isChangedSinceOpened()
        Gets the value of isChangedSinceOpened.
        Returns:
        true if the data has been changed since the file was opened, otherwise false

      • setIsChangedSinceOpened

        public static void setIsChangedSinceOpened(java.lang.Boolean b)

        Parameters:

      • isChangedSinceLastSave

        public static java.lang.Boolean isChangedSinceLastSave()
        Gets the value of isChangedSinceLastSave.
        Returns:
        true if the file has been modified since the last save, otherwise false

      • wasLastYearDefinedInFile

        public static java.lang.Boolean wasLastYearDefinedInFile()
        Returns a value indicating the special case in which the last year of the data set was not originally defined in the FHX2 file.
        Returns:
        true if it was originally defined, false otherwise

        public static void importFile(java.io.File theImportedFile)
                       throws CompositeFileException
        Loads an FHX file from the disk and stores the data in theFHX2File.
        Parameters:
        theImportedFile -
        Throws:

      • loadDialog

        public static void loadDialog()
                       throws CompositeFileException
        Determines the actions of the loading dialog when importing new files.
        Throws:
        CompositeFileException

      • save

        public static void save()
        Checks if a path for the current theFHX2File exists and calls doSaveFileFunctionality(). If the path does not exist the saveAs() method is called to create one.

      • doSaveFileFunctionality

        private static void doSaveFileFunctionality()
        Saves the data stored in theFHX2File to a .fhx file at filepath.

      • saveAs

        public static void saveAs()
        Opens a JFileChooser for the user to set the filepath to save theFHX2File. to, then calls doSaveFileFunctionality()
